```{r ch1, eval=FALSE}
install.packages(c("eRm", "dplyr", "psychonetrics", "qgraph", "mirt"))

library("psychonetrics")
library("qgraph")
library("mirt")
```

# Student Confident in Reading (SCR) in PIRLS 2021 

```{r ch2}
# Students from Alberta, Canada
load("scr_canada.Rdata")

# First 6 rows of the data
head(scr_canada)

# Variable names
names(scr_canada)

# Save the data as a data.frame
scr_canada <- as.data.frame(scr_canada)

# Select only the SCR items
scr <- select(scr_canada, starts_with("ASBR08"))

# Remove students with no valid responses and recode 9 as missing
scr_nomissing <- scr %>%
  filter_all(all_vars(!is.na(.))) %>%
  mutate_all(~na_if(., 9)) %>%
  as.data.frame()
```

# Random-Intercept EGA
```{r ch3}
riEGA(data = scr_nomissing, plot.EGA = TRUE)
```
